## BaseSearchConfig interface

The base configuration options for [SearchCore](./anguyen-search-core-test.searchcore.md)<!-- -->, which includes the options from [ServingConfig](./anguyen-search-core-test.servingconfig.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface BaseSearchConfig extends ServingConfig 
```
**Extends:** [ServingConfig](./anguyen-search-core-test.servingconfig.md)
